channel.title: Xero's Greatsword (Untextured)
channel.description:
First model using metasequia... Its nothing like c4d just so you know... im planning to make the hilt larger and incase you cant see theres 3 spikes on the circular portion of the blade. This weapon is not supposed to be sharp its a blunt weapon used by a massive barbaric character I drew a while back. So any thoughts on it?
PICS: [IMG]http://i1011.photobucket.com/albums/af235/Mr_Biosoft/Firstmodelearlyrender3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1011.photobucket.com/albums/af235/Mr_Biosoft/Firstmodelearlyrender.jpg[/img]

item.title: Xero's Greatsword (Untextured)
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Biosoft Mr_Biosoft
item.description:
@Mr_Biosoft wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:20, topic:334731”][quote author=Mr_Biosoft link=topic=431129.msg3168467#msg3168467 date=1270231198]

that game sounds dirty

If you arnt going to offer constructive criticism on my thread please go away. Most of the other post here at least kinda stick to the topic where as yours are vulgar and uncalled for completely. So please dont post on my thread with your comments for post count. They make little to no sense as is and it irritates me. Please, thank you, bye.

Oooooooo, harsh

I see it more as honesty. I know the model is not at all great atm. It was honestly rushed. And the themometer and oussy comments are not helpful at all and honestly uncalled for and just plain spam.
[/quote]
Well just start the fuck over.[/quote]

I am lol im trying to get a few server things and client things dne atm then ima do some more customs

Read full topic

item.title: Xero's Greatsword (Untextured)
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Biosoft Mr_Biosoft
item.description:
@Mr_Biosoft wrote:

one of my next model projects asside from the biosoft greatsword will be to completely redo this model. Im dissapointed in it although it was my first real attempt at anything. SO hopefull after the biosoft greatsword (Looking for hilt inspiration…) I will be working on making it look more like my concept art. It is unique solely due to the fact that no one else in any game has designed a sword solely for blunt force trauma like this one… And I have also began to work on my client and server (Many thanks to rip4d). Im slowly learning thanks to the many great modelers here who are offering wonderful advice. And CJ’s tutorial started me off (no the model was not made with his tutorial I went on my own trying to figure meta out) Anyway Until later leave comment although im sure they will all be along the lines of WTFH or OMFG THIS SUCKS. But still im improving and even negative comments help just tell me what I should improve upon.

Read full topic

item.title: Xero's Greatsword (Untextured)
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Biosoft Mr_Biosoft
item.description:
@Mr_Biosoft wrote:

Thanks for the info. Its a WIP, Im slowly learning my way around meta and this was a item I have wanted to model out for a while and for a first actual model with meta I think it turned out fairly decent. Perhaps you could give me more tips. You seem to know a lot about meta.

As for the spikes I have them there but I was trying to get the right size and now they appear to small where as they were to large before.

Thanks for the comment Shrogg. Ill probably work more on it today. If I do and get it textured Ill update the pics.

Read full topic

item.title: Xero's Greatsword (Untextured)
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

well, here goes
first off, you might want to color it and then, sharpen it, it looks kindah blunt xD

and yeah, sharpen the top bit, and attach it to the main shaft of the sword.

and GIVE IT SPIKES

Read full topic
